mapper.select: SELECT PR.PDREVIEW_CONTENT, PR.ORDER_NO, PR.PD_NO, PA.ORDER_DATE,PD.PD_NAME,PR.PDREVIEW_NO,PR.DR_NO,PR.PRP_RENAME FROM PRODUCTREVIEW PR JOIN PAYMENT PA ON(PR.ORDER_NO=PA.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT PD ON(PD.PD_NO=PR.PD_NO) WHERE PR.DR_NO=#{drNo} ORDER BY PR.PDREVIEW_NO DESC

SELECT PA.ORDER_NO,PA.ORDER_DATE,TO_CHAR(PA.AMOUNT_PRICE,'999,999,999') AS AMOUNT_PRICE,PA.DR_NO,OP.PD_NO,PD.PD_NAME, OS.O_CODE,OS.O_NAME,PH.PDP_RENAME FROM PAYMENT PA JOIN ORDERPRODUCT OP ON(PA.ORDER_NO=OP.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT PD ON(PD.PD_NO=OP.PD_NO) JOIN ORDERMG OM ON(OM.ORDER_NO=PA.ORDER_NO) JOIN ORDER_STATE OS ON(OM.O_CODE=OS.O_CODE) JOIN PRODUCTPHOTO PH ON(PH.PD_NO=PD.PD_NO) WHERE PA.DR_NO =#{drNo} AND (OM.O_CODE BETWEEN 1 AND 5 OR OM.O_CODE=14) AND PH.PDP_TYPE=0 ORDER BY PA.ORDER_DATE DESC

SELECT PA.ORDER_NO,PA.ORDER_DATE,TO_CHAR(PA.AMOUNT_PRICE,'999,999,999') AS AMOUNT_PRICE,PA.PAYMENT_WAY,PA.USE_POINT,PA.DR_NO,OP.PD_NO,OP.OP_COUNT, PD.PD_NAME,OS.O_CODE,OS.O_NAME, TO_CHAR(ORIGIN_PRICE-SELL_PRICE+PA.USE_POINT,'999,999,999') AS DISCOUNT_PRICE,TO_CHAR(PD.ORIGIN_PRICE,'999,999,999') AS ORIGIN_PRICE, C.DR_NAME,C.DR_POSTCODE,C.DR_ADDRESS,C.DR_PHONE ,TO_CHAR(ORIGIN_PRICE*OP.OP_COUNT,'999,999,999') AS COUNTMULTIPLE FROM PAYMENT PA JOIN ORDERPRODUCT OP ON(PA.ORDER_NO=OP.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT PD ON(PD.PD_NO=OP.PD_NO) JOIN ORDERMG OM ON(OM.ORDER_NO=PA.ORDER_NO) JOIN ORDER_STATE OS ON(OM.O_CODE=OS.O_CODE) JOIN DRCLIENT C ON(OM.DR_NO=C.DR_NO) WHERE PA.DR_NO =#{drNo} AND OM.ORDER_NO=#{orderNo} ORDER BY PA.ORDER_DATE DESC

SELECT PA.ORDER_NO,PA.ORDER_DATE,TO_CHAR(PA.AMOUNT_PRICE,'999,999,999') AS AMOUNT_PRICE,PA.DR_NO,OP.PD_NO,PD.PD_NAME, OS.O_CODE,OS.O_NAME,PH.PDP_RENAME FROM PAYMENT PA JOIN ORDERPRODUCT OP ON(PA.ORDER_NO=OP.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT PD ON(PD.PD_NO=OP.PD_NO) JOIN ORDERMG OM ON(OM.ORDER_NO=PA.ORDER_NO) JOIN ORDER_STATE OS ON(OM.O_CODE=OS.O_CODE) JOIN PRODUCTPHOTO PH ON(PH.PD_NO=PD.PD_NO) WHERE PA.DR_NO =#{drNo} AND (OM.O_CODE BETWEEN 1 AND 5 OR OM.O_CODE=14) AND PH.PDP_TYPE=0 AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) - ORDER_DATE =0 AND 7>=TRUNC(SYSDATE)-ORDER_DATE AND 30>=TRUNC(SYSDATE) - ORDER_DATE AND 90>= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - ORDER_DATE AND 180>= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - ORDER_DATE ORDER BY PA.ORDER_DATE DESC

SELECT PA.ORDER_NO,PA.ORDER_DATE,TO_CHAR(PA.AMOUNT_PRICE,'999,999,999') AS AMOUNT_PRICE,PA.DR_NO,OP.PD_NO,PD.PD_NAME, OS.O_CODE,OS.O_NAME,PH.PDP_RENAME FROM PAYMENT PA JOIN ORDERPRODUCT OP ON(PA.ORDER_NO=OP.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT PD ON(PD.PD_NO=OP.PD_NO) JOIN ORDERMG OM ON(OM.ORDER_NO=PA.ORDER_NO) JOIN ORDER_STATE OS ON(OM.O_CODE=OS.O_CODE) JOIN PRODUCTPHOTO PH ON(PH.PD_NO=PD.PD_NO) WHERE PA.DR_NO =#{drNo} AND (OM.O_CODE BETWEEN 1 AND 5 OR OM.O_CODE=14) AND ORDER_DATE BETWEEN #{calendarDate1} AND #{calendarDate2} AND PH.PDP_TYPE=0 ORDER BY PA.ORDER_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDERMG SET O_CODE=14 WHERE ORDER_NO =#{orderNo} AND DR_NO=#{dNo}
mapper.select: SELECT OQ.*,P.PD_NO,P.PD_NAME,OM.DR_NO FROM ORDERQNA OQ JOIN ORDERMG OM ON(OQ.ORDER_NO=OM.ORDER_NO) JOIN ORDERPRODUCT OP ON(OM.ORDER_NO=OP.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT P ON(P.PD_NO=OP.PD_NO) WHERE OM.DR_NO=#{drNo} AND OQ.OQNA_STATUS='Y'

SELECT OQ.*,P.PD_NO,P.PD_NAME,OM.DR_NO FROM ORDERQNA OQ JOIN ORDERMG OM ON(OQ.ORDER_NO=OM.ORDER_NO) JOIN ORDERPRODUCT OP ON(OM.ORDER_NO=OP.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT P ON(P.PD_NO=OP.PD_NO) WHERE OM.DR_NO=#{drNo} AND OQ.OQNA_STATUS='N' ORDER BY OQ.OQNA_DATE DESC

SELECT PA.ORDER_NO,PA.ORDER_DATE,TO_CHAR(PA.AMOUNT_PRICE,'999,999,999') AS AMOUNT_PRICE,PA.DR_NO,OP.PD_NO,PD.PD_NAME, OS.O_CODE,OS.O_NAME,PH.PDP_RENAME FROM PAYMENT PA JOIN ORDERPRODUCT OP ON(PA.ORDER_NO=OP.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT PD ON(PD.PD_NO=OP.PD_NO) JOIN ORDERMG OM ON(OM.ORDER_NO=PA.ORDER_NO) JOIN ORDER_STATE OS ON(OM.O_CODE=OS.O_CODE) JOIN PRODUCTPHOTO PH ON(PH.PD_NO=PD.PD_NO) WHERE PA.DR_NO =#{drNo} AND PH.PDP_TYPE=0 AND (OM.O_CODE BETWEEN 6 AND 13 OR OM.O_CODE = 15) ORDER BY PA.ORDER_DATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAYMENT PA JOIN ORDERMG OM ON(OM.ORDER_NO=PA.ORDER_NO) WHERE PA.DR_NO=#{drNo} AND OM.O_CODE BETWEEN 1 AND 5 OR OM.O_CODE =14 AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) - PA.ORDER_DATE =0 AND 7>=TRUNC(SYSDATE)-PA.ORDER_DATE AND 30>=TRUNC(SYSDATE) - PA.ORDER_DATE AND 90>= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - PA.ORDER_DATE AND 180>= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - PA.ORDER_DATE

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAYMENT PA JOIN ORDERMG OM ON(OM.ORDER_NO=PA.ORDER_NO) WHERE PA.DR_NO=#{drNo} AND OM.O_CODE BETWEEN 1 AND 5 OR OM.O_CODE =14 AND PA.ORDER_DATE BETWEEN #{calendarDate1} AND #{calendarDate2}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDERQNA OQ JOIN ORDERMG OM ON(OQ.ORDER_NO=OM.ORDER_NO) WHERE OM.DR_NO=#{drNo} AND OQNA_STATUS='Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCTREVIEW SET PDREVIEW_CONTENT = #{pdReviewContent},PRP_ORIGINAL=#{originFile},PRP_RENAME=#{renameFile} WHERE ORDER_NO=#{orderNo} AND DR_NO=#{dNo}
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(SUM(use_point),0) AS MONTHSUMUSEPOINT FROM PAYMENT WHERE DR_NO=#{drNo} AND TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE,'Month') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'Month')
SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MONTH') AS NOWMONTH FROM DUAL

SELECT TO_CHAR('-'||P.USE_POINT,'999,999,999') AS USESAVE_POINT,P.USE_DATE AS USESAVE_DATE,PD.PD_NAME AS PDHPNAME,PD.PD_NO AS HP_RE_NO,PD.ORIGIN_PRICE AS ADR_NO FROM PAYMENT P JOIN ORDERPRODUCT OP ON(P.ORDER_NO=OP.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT PD ON(OP.PD_NO=PD.PD_NO) WHERE P.DR_NO=#{drNo} AND USE_POINT !=0
UNION
SELECT TO_CHAR(PS.GETPOINT,'999,999,999'),PS.GETDATE,H.HP_NAME,ps.hp_re_no,PS.ADR_NO FROM POINTSAVE PS JOIN HPREVIEW HW ON(PS.HP_RE_NO = HW.HP_RE_NO) JOIN HOSPITAL H ON(HW.HP_NO=H.HP_NO) WHERE PS.DR_NO=#{drNo}
UNION
SELECT TO_CHAR(PS.GETPOINT,'999,999,999'),PS.GETDATE,AD.AD_TITLE,ps.hp_re_no,PS.ADR_NO FROM POINTSAVE PS JOIN ASKDRREPLY A ON(A.ADR_NO = PS.ADR_NO) JOIN ASKDR AD ON(AD.AD_NO=A.AD_NO) WHERE PS.DR_NO=#{drNo} ORDER BY 2 DESC

select count(*) from( SELECT TO_CHAR('-'||P.USE_POINT,'999,999,999') AS USESAVE_POINT,P.USE_DATE AS USESAVE_DATE,PD.PD_NAME AS PDHPNAME,PD.PD_NO AS HP_RE_NO,PD.ORIGIN_PRICE AS ADR_NO FROM PAYMENT P JOIN ORDERPRODUCT OP ON(P.ORDER_NO=OP.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT PD ON(OP.PD_NO=PD.PD_NO) WHERE P.DR_NO=#{drNo} AND USE_POINT !=0
UNION
SELECT TO_CHAR(PS.GETPOINT,'999,999,999'),PS.GETDATE,H.HP_NAME,ps.hp_re_no,PS.ADR_NO FROM POINTSAVE PS JOIN HPREVIEW HW ON(PS.HP_RE_NO = HW.HP_RE_NO) JOIN HOSPITAL H ON(HW.HP_NO=H.HP_NO) WHERE PS.DR_NO=#{drNo}
UNION
SELECT TO_CHAR(PS.GETPOINT,'999,999,999'),PS.GETDATE,AD.AD_TITLE,ps.hp_re_no,PS.ADR_NO FROM POINTSAVE PS JOIN ASKDRREPLY A ON(A.ADR_NO = PS.ADR_NO) JOIN ASKDR AD ON(AD.AD_NO=A.AD_NO) WHERE PS.DR_NO=#{drNo} ORDER BY 2 DESC)
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDERMG SET O_CODE=#{oCode} WHERE ORDER_NO=#{orderNo}
mapper.select: SELECT D.DR_NO, D.DR_NAME, D.HP_NO, HP.HP_NAME, D.HPCATE_CODE, HG.HPCATE_NAME, DR_EMAIL, DR_LIKE, DR_DISLIKE, PRO_RENAME FROM DRCLIENT D JOIN HOSPITAL HP ON(D.HP_NO = HP.HP_NO) JOIN HPCATEGORY HG ON(D.HPCATE_CODE = HG.HPCATE_CODE) JOIN PROFILEPHOTO PH ON(D.DR_NO = PH.DR_NO) WHERE D.DR_NO=#{replyDrNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ASKDRREPLY WHERE DR_NO=#{drNo} AND ADR_CHOOSESTATUS='Y'

SELECT ROWNUM, DR_COMMENT_NO, DR_COMMENT_DATE, DR_COMMENT, C_NO, C_NICKNAME, PRO_RENAME, DR_NO, COMMENTCOUNT FROM ( SELECT DR_COMMENT_NO, DR_COMMENT_DATE, DR_COMMENT, DC.C_NO, C.C_NICKNAME, PH.PRO_RENAME, DC.DR_NO, (SELECT COUNT(*)FROM DRCOMMENT WHERE DR_NO='D01') COMMENTCOUNT FROM DRCOMMENT DC JOIN CLIENT C ON(DC.C_NO = C.C_NO) LEFT JOIN PROFILEPHOTO PH ON (DC.C_NO = PH.C_NO) WHERE DC.DR_NO=#{drNo} group by DR_COMMENT_NO, DR_COMMENT_DATE, DR_COMMENT, DC.C_NO, C.C_NICKNAME, PH.PRO_RENAME, DC.DR_NO ORDER BY DR_COMMENT_DATE DESC )

SELECT ROWNUM, DR_COMMENT_NO, DR_COMMENT_DATE, DR_COMMENT, C_NO, C_NICKNAME, PRO_RENAME, DR_NO FROM ( SELECT DR_COMMENT_NO, DR_COMMENT_DATE, DR_COMMENT, DC.C_NO, C.C_NICKNAME, PH.PRO_RENAME, DC.DR_NO FROM DRCOMMENT DC JOIN CLIENT C ON(DC.C_NO = C.C_NO) LEFT JOIN PROFILEPHOTO PH ON (DC.C_NO = PH.C_NO) WHERE DC.DR_NO=#{drNo} ORDER BY DR_COMMENT_DATE DESC )
